end process what's going on and then access to data in the context of the of their work or their or their

it becomes instantly executable the tasks inside the environment become addressable to mobile devices on web

start points and endpoints represent by events which are these circles activities are then these squares and

design and then participate in that process orchestration and finally when you run that process
not only can you track the process in real time as you can see in this diagram i can see
highlighted in blue all the activities have been completed highlighted in green i can see where the current state of an
individual process is and then overlaid on top of that i can see all the analytics for each step of
the process i can see how long it's been sitting inside someone's uh work queue how
when did they click on that item and start working on it and how long did they actually take to complete that item
all those are measured in what we call bam metrics or business activity monitoring metrics
every single activity inside the appian environment has automatic band statistics enabled on it so you can get
very detailed throughput analysis on all your processes identify the bottlenecks and
continuously improve those processes over time supporting a continuous process improvement life cycle
now inside this environment we also include an enterprise content management system

we also support interesting features such as compound and document dynamic document generation so these are things
